attributes.action: Withdraw British Troops From Iraq By Summer 2008 And Plans To Be Made Several Months Before
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We ask for our prime minister, who was put here by the British people along with his party to serve in the interest of Britain and its people, to Withdraw British troops from Iraq as it is not in the interest of the British people to occupy that country until after Summer 2008. It would benefit all people concerned to pull out of Iraq for the fact we occupy Iraq radicalizes people as demonstrated in the Iraqi style terrorist attacks on the country recently. It has now become a threat to national security to remain in Iraq and we must pull out soon. End the Bloodshed, this is your people, those you are here to serve, speaking, prompting you to act, please, end the bloodshed.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
